Uses of Class
asgn2Exceptions.CustomerException

  • Packages that use CustomerException 
    Package Description
    asgn2Customers
    This package contains classes that represent customers at the restaurant as well as a class that creates those classes using the factory method pattern.
    asgn2Restaurant
    This package contains classes that act as a bridge between the GUI, the log files and the classes in the asgn2Customers and the asgn2Pizzas packages.
    asgn2Tests
    This package contains the JUnit test classes that test classes in the asgn2Pizzas, asgn2Customers, asgn2Restaurant packages.

    • Uses of CustomerException in asgn2Customers

      Methods in asgn2Customers that throw CustomerException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Customer CustomerFactory.getCustomer(java.lang.String customerCode, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String mobileNumber, int locationX, int locationY)
      A method that uses the Factory Method pattern to produce an instance of one of the asgn2Customers.Customer subclasses.
      Constructors in asgn2Customers that throw CustomerException 
      Constructor and Description
      Customer(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String mobileNumber, int locationX, int locationY, java.lang.String type)
      This class represents a customer of the Pizza Palace restaurant.
      DriverDeliveryCustomer(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String mobileNumber, int locationX, int locationY)
      This class represents a customer of the Pizza Palace restaurant that has chosen to have their pizza delivered by a driver.
      DroneDeliveryCustomer(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String mobileNumber, int locationX, int locationY)
      This class represents a customer of the Pizza Palace restaurant that has chosen to have their pizza delivered by a drone.
      PickUpCustomer(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String mobileNumber, int locationX, int locationY)
      This class represents a customer of the Pizza Palace restaurant that has chosen to pickup their pizza at the restaurant.

    • Uses of CustomerException in asgn2Restaurant

      Methods in asgn2Restaurant that throw CustomerException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Customer LogHandler.createCustomer(java.lang.String line)
      Creates a Customer object by parsing the information contained in a single line of the log file.
      Customer PizzaRestaurant.getCustomerByIndex(int index)
      Returns the Customer object contained at the specified index of the customers field.
      static java.util.ArrayList<Customer> LogHandler.populateCustomerDataset(java.lang.String filename)
      Returns an ArrayList of Customer objects from the information contained in the log file ordered as they appear in the log file.
      boolean PizzaRestaurant.processLog(java.lang.String filename)
      This method processes the information contained in the log file and populates the customers and pizzas fields.
